public ref class GenericTypeParameterBuilder sealed : System::Reflection::TypeInfo

summary.span: 定義和建立動態定義泛型類型和方法的泛型類型參數。

span.span: Defines and creates generic type parameters for dynamically defined generic types and methods.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以取得的陣列物件使用方法，將型別參數，為動態類型，因此讓它成為泛型型別，或使用方法，將動態方法的型別參數。You can get an array of objects by using the method to add type parameters to a dynamic type, thus making it a generic type, or by using the method to add type parameters to a dynamic method. 使用條件約束加入型別參數的物件。Use the objects to add constraints to the type parameters. 條件約束有三種：Constraints are of three kinds: - 基底類型條件約束會指定任何指派給泛型類型參數的類型必須衍生自特定的基底類型。The base type constraint specifies that any type assigned to the generic type parameter must derive from a particular base type. 設定此條件約束使用方法。Set this constraint by using the method. - 介面條件約束會指定任何指派給泛型類型參數的類型必須實作特定介面。An interface constraint specifies that any type assigned to the generic type parameter must implement a particular interface. 使用設定的介面條件約束方法。Set the interface constraints by using the method. - 特殊條件約束會指定任何指派給泛型類型參數的型別必須具有預設建構函式，必須是參考類型，或是必須是實值類型。Special constraints specify that any type assigned to the generic type parameter must have a default constructor, must be a reference type, or must be a value type. 設定使用的型別參數特殊條件約束方法。Set the special constraints for a type parameter by using the method. 介面條件約束和特殊條件約束無法擷取使用的方法類別。Interface constraints and special constraints cannot be retrieved using methods of the class. 當您建立包含的型別參數的泛型型別之後時，您可以使用其物件以反映這些條件約束。Once you have created the generic type that contains the type parameters, you can use its object to reflect the constraints. 使用方法來取得的型別參數，每個類型參數使用方法來取得基底類型條件約束和介面條件約束，而屬性，即可取得的特殊條件約束。Use the method to get the type parameters, and for each type parameter use the method to get the base type constraint and interface constraints, and the property to get the special constraints. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立具有兩個型別參數，泛型型別，並將它們儲存在組件 GenericEmitExample1.dll。The following code example creates a generic type with two type parameters, and saves them in the assembly GenericEmitExample1.dll. 您可以使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 解譯器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)若要檢視產生的型別。You can use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to view the generated types. 如需定義動態的泛型類型所需的步驟的更詳細說明，請參閱[如何： 定義泛型類型使用反映發出](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/how-to-define-a-generic-type-with-reflection-emit.md)。For a more detailed explanation of the steps involved in defining a dynamic generic type, see [How to: Define a Generic Type with Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/how-to-define-a-generic-type-with-reflection-emit.md). [!code-cpp[EmitGenericType#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EmitGenericType/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EmitGenericType#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EmitGenericType/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EmitGenericType#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/EmitGenericType/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 傳回一維陣列型別，其元素型別為泛型型別參數。

span.span: Returns the type of a one-dimensional array whose element type is the generic type parameter.

returns.span: 物件，表示其元素型別為泛型型別參數的一維陣列型別。

span.span: A object that represents the type of a one-dimensional array whose element type is the generic type parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可用來產生參數清單的陣列型別。The method provides a way to generate array types for parameter lists. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立動態模組，也就是抽象的泛型型別，以名為`Sample`一個型別參數與`T`，和名為的抽象方法`TestMethod`。The following code example creates a dynamic module, an abstract generic type named `Sample` with one type parameter, `T`, and an abstract method named `TestMethod`. `TestMethod` 會採用`ref`參數 (`ByRef`在 Visual Basic 中) 的型別`T`，類型的指標`T`，以及陣列`T`。`TestMethod` takes a `ref` parameter (`ByRef` in Visual Basic) of type `T`, a pointer to type `T`, and an array of `T`. 這個方法會傳回的二維陣列`T`。This method returns a two-dimensional array of `T`. 程式碼範例，將動態模組儲存至磁碟，因此您可以檢查它使用 MSIL 組譯工具 (Ildasm.exe)。The code example saves the dynamic module to disk, so you can examine it using the MSIL Disassembler (Ildasm.exe). [!code-cpp[MakeXxxGenericTypeParameterBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MakeXxxGenericTypeParameterBuilder/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MakeXxxGenericTypeParameterBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MakeXxxGenericTypeParameterBuilder/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MakeXxxGenericTypeParameterBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MakeXxxGenericTypeParameterBuilder/VB/source.vb#1)]

.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Type MakeArrayType(int32 rank) cil managed
Public Overrides Function MakeArrayType (rank As Integer) As Type
public: override Type ^ MakeArrayType(int rank);

span.span: The number of dimensions for the array.

summary.span: 傳回陣列的類型，其項目類型是以維度數目指定的泛型類型參數。

span.span: Returns the type of an array whose element type is the generic type parameter, with the specified number of dimensions.

span.span: A object that represents the type of an array whose element type is the generic type parameter, with the specified number of dimensions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可用來產生參數清單的陣列型別。The method provides a way to generate array types for parameter lists. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立動態模組，也就是抽象的泛型型別，以名為`Sample`一個型別參數與`T`，和名為的抽象方法`TestMethod`。The following code example creates a dynamic module, an abstract generic type named `Sample` with one type parameter, `T`, and an abstract method named `TestMethod`. `TestMethod` 會採用`ref`參數 (`ByRef`在 Visual Basic 中) 的型別`T`，類型的指標`T`，以及陣列`T`。`TestMethod` takes a `ref` parameter (`ByRef` in Visual Basic) of type `T`, a pointer to type `T`, and an array of `T`. 這個方法會傳回的二維陣列`T`。This method returns a two-dimensional array of `T`. 程式碼範例，將動態模組儲存至磁碟，因此您可以檢查它使用 MSIL 組譯工具 (Ildasm.exe)。The code example saves the dynamic module to disk, so you can examine it using the MSIL Disassembler (Ildasm.exe). [!code-cpp[MakeXxxGenericTypeParameterBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MakeXxxGenericTypeParameterBuilder/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MakeXxxGenericTypeParameterBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MakeXxxGenericTypeParameterBuilder/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MakeXxxGenericTypeParameterBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MakeXxxGenericTypeParameterBuilder/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: is not a valid number of dimensions.
For example, its value is less than 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要擷取的基底類型條件約束使用屬性。To retrieve the base type constraint use the property. 當您建立包含型別參數的泛型型別之後時，您可以使用其物件以反映型別參數和其條件約束。Once you have created the generic type that contains the type parameter, you can use its object to reflect the type parameter and their constraints. 若要取得完整的泛型類型的型別參數，請使用方法。To get the type parameters of a completed generic type, use the method. 每個類型參數，取得基底類型條件約束和介面條件約束使用方法，這個方法，以取得特殊條件約束使用屬性。For each type parameter, get the base type constraint and interface constraints by using the method, and get the special constraints by using the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立具有兩個型別參數，第二個具有基底類型條件約束，並將其儲存在組件 GenericEmitExample1.dll 泛型型別。The following code example creates a generic type with two type parameters, the second of which has a base type constraint, and saves them in the assembly GenericEmitExample1.dll. 您可以使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 解譯器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)若要檢視產生的型別。You can use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to view the generated types. 如需定義動態的泛型類型所需的步驟的更詳細說明，請參閱[如何： 定義泛型類型使用反映發出](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/how-to-define-a-generic-type-with-reflection-emit.md)。For a more detailed explanation of the steps involved in defining a dynamic generic type, see [How to: Define a Generic Type with Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/how-to-define-a-generic-type-with-reflection-emit.md). MemberSignature.Value: public void SetGenericParameterAttributes (System.Reflection.GenericParameterAttributes genericParameterAttributes);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetGenericParameterAttributes(valuetype System.Reflection.GenericParameterAttributes genericParameterAttributes) cil managed
public: void SetGenericParameterAttributes(System::Reflection::GenericParameterAttributes genericParameterAttributes);

param.name: genericParameterAttributes
param.span: 值的位元組合，代表泛型類型參數的變異數特性和特殊條件約束。

span.span: A bitwise combination of values that represent the variance characteristics and special constraints of the generic type parameter.

summary.span: 設定泛型參數的變異數特性和特殊條件約束，例如無參數建構函式條件約束。

span.span: Sets the variance characteristics and special constraints of the generic parameter, such as the parameterless constructor constraint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 特殊條件約束可以指定任何指派給泛型類型參數的型別必須具有預設建構函式，必須是參考類型，或是必須是實值類型。Special constraints can specify that any type assigned to the generic type parameter must have a default constructor, must be a reference type, or must be a value type. 特殊條件約束不能使用的方法擷取類別。Special constraints cannot be retrieved using methods of the class. 當您建立包含型別參數的泛型型別之後時，您可以使用其物件以反映型別參數和其條件約束。Once you have created the generic type that contains the type parameter, you can use its object to reflect the type parameters and their constraints. 若要取得完整的泛型類型的型別參數，請使用方法。To get the type parameters of a completed generic type, use the method. 若要取得每個類型參數特殊條件約束，請使用屬性。To get the special constraints for each type parameter, use the property. 參考型別參數的變異數特性的列舉值是僅適用於支援共變數和反變數，例如 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) 的語言。The enumeration values that refer to the variance characteristics of a type parameter are relevant only in languages that support covariance and contravariance, such as Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL). Visual Basic 和 C# 目前不支援共變數和反變數。Visual Basic and C# currently do not support covariance and contravariance. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立具有兩個型別參數，其中的第一個有預設建構函式，而且必須是參考類型，受限於，並將其儲存在組件 GenericEmitExample1.dll 泛型型別。The following code example creates a generic type with two type parameters, the first of which is constrained to have a default constructor and to be a reference type, and saves them in the assembly GenericEmitExample1.dll. 您可以使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 解譯器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)若要檢視產生的型別。You can use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to view the generated types. 如需定義動態的泛型類型所需的步驟的更詳細說明，請參閱[如何： 定義泛型類型使用反映發出](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/how-to-define-a-generic-type-with-reflection-emit.md)。For a more detailed explanation of the steps involved in defining a dynamic generic type, see [How to: Define a Generic Type with Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/how-to-define-a-generic-type-with-reflection-emit.md). [!code-cpp[EmitGenericType#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EmitGenericType/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EmitGenericType#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EmitGenericType/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EmitGenericType#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/EmitGenericType/VB/source.vb#1)]
